speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, today I recognize Lowry, SD. The town of Lowry will celebrate the 100th anniversary of its founding this year.

Since its beginning in 1907, Lowry has been a strong reflection of South Dakota's values and traditions. As they celebrate this milestone anniversary, I am confident that Lowry will continue to thrive and succeed for the next 100 years.
I would like to offer my congratulations to the citizens of Lowry on their anniversary and wish them continued prosperity in the years to come.
